name: Escape the Graveyard
description:
Arrow keys or WASD to move.

Pro tips:

  • Skeletons are weak to baseball bats
  • Some skeletons wander aimlessly, while others pursue you mercilessly
  • You can't pick up a key while carrying a bat, and vice versa

Made in 48 hours for the Spooky 2D Jam. Tools used include Unity, Aseprite, Bfxr, and GarageBand. All assets by me except for the font: Munro (http://tenbytwenty.com/#munro).
